#define VPS_CFG_CAPT_VPDMA_PRIORITY   (VPSHAL_VPDMA_DATADESCPRIO_0)
 Define this macro to load custome VPDMA firmware. More...
 
#define VPS_CFG_DISP_VPDMA_PRIORITY   (VPSHAL_VPDMA_DATADESCPRIO_1)
 VPDMA priority for display clients.
 
#define VPS_CFG_M2M_VPDMA_PRIORITY_RD   (VPSHAL_VPDMA_DATADESCPRIO_7)
 VPDMA priority for M2M clients for read.
 
#define VPS_CFG_M2M_VPDMA_PRIORITY_WR   (VPS_CFG_M2M_VPDMA_PRIORITY_RD)
 VPDMA priority for M2M clients for write.
 
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_COL   (8U)
 Maximum number of windows per row supported in multiple window mode. This is used to allocate memory and array size statically. Note: This macro could be changed as and when the requirement changes.
 
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_ROW   (8U)
 Maximum number of rows per frame supported in multiple window mode. This is used to allocate memory and array size statically. Note: This macro could be changed as and when the requirement changes.
 
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN
 Maximum number of frames supported in multiple window mode. This is used to allocate memory and array size statically. Note: This macro could be changed as and when the requirement changes. More...
 
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_IN_DESC   (VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_COL * 2U + 9U)
 Maximum number of in data descriptors. First row multi window descriptor * 2U for Y/C separate clients + considering worst case client - 9 IN channels of DEI HQ path without SC writback path. (Current field covered in multi window descriptor, 3x2 previous fields, 2 MV in, 1 MVSTM in). Note: This macro can be changed as and when requirement changes.
 
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_OUT_DESC   (6U)
 Maximum number of out data descriptors. Considering worst case client - 6 OUT channels of DEI HQ path without SC writback path. (4 Current field out, 1 MV out, 1 MVSTM out). Note: This macro can be changed as and when requirement changes.
 
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_DESC
 Maximum number of multi window data descriptor to allocate per client to program from 2nd row descriptors. Max multi window descriptor (- first row) * 2U for Y/C separate clients 1 for "Zero transfer descriptor" * 2U for Y/C separate clients 1 for a SOCH on last window channel (either actual or free channel) and abort descriptor on actual channel * 2U for Y/C separate clients Abort descriptor on free channel of last window in all rows * 2U for Y/C separate clients (/2U since abort desc is 1/2 the size of data desc). Note: This macro can be changed as and when requirement changes. More...
 
#define VPS_CFG_USE_SYNC_ON_CH
 Define this macro to use Sync on Channel instead of Sync on Client in all M2M drivers while chaining different channels in a single VPDMA submission. Uncomment this to use Sync on Client.
 
#define VPS_CFG_COMP_BKCOLOR   (0x04010040U)
 Blender/Comp BackGround Color in RGB Format is 30-bit packed.
 
#define VPS_CFG_VCOMP_BKCOLOR   (0x20080000U)
 VCOMP BackGround Color in YUV. Format is 0x0CRCBYY (each 10 bits).
 
#define VPS_CFG_VPDMA_ARGB_BKCOLOR   (0x000000FFU)
 VPDMA BackGround Color in ARGB. Format is 0xAARRGGBB.
 
#define VPS_CFG_VPDMA_YUV_BKCOLOR   (0x00008080U)
 VPDMA BackGround Color in YUV. Format is 0x00YYCBCR.
 

Detailed Description

Starterware header file containing globally used configuration.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define VPS_CFG_CAPT_VPDMA_PRIORITY   (VPSHAL_VPDMA_DATADESCPRIO_0)

Define this macro to load custome VPDMA firmware.

Define this macro to enable descriptor placement in OCMC. VPDMA priority for capture clients

Maximum number of windows per row supported in multiple window mode. This is used to allocate memory ...
Definition: stw_config.h:150

Maximum number of frames supported in multiple window mode. This is used to allocate memory and array size statically. Note: This macro could be changed as and when the requirement changes.

#define VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_DESC
Value:
((VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_COL * \
(VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_ROW - 1U) * 2U) \
+ (1U * 2U) \
+ (1U * 2U) \
+ ((VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_ROW * 2U) / 2U))
VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_ROW
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_ROW
Maximum number of rows per frame supported in multiple window mode. This is used to allocate memory a...
Definition: stw_config.h:157
VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_COL
#define VPS_CFG_MAX_MULTI_WIN_COL
Maximum number of windows per row supported in multiple window mode. This is used to allocate memory ...
Definition: stw_config.h:150

Maximum number of multi window data descriptor to allocate per client to program from 2nd row descriptors. Max multi window descriptor (- first row) * 2U for Y/C separate clients 1 for "Zero transfer descriptor" * 2U for Y/C separate clients 1 for a SOCH on last window channel (either actual or free channel) and abort descriptor on actual channel * 2U for Y/C separate clients Abort descriptor on free channel of last window in all rows * 2U for Y/C separate clients (/2U since abort desc is 1/2 the size of data desc). Note: This macro can be changed as and when requirement changes.
